RawLine: TNPC_50008551,牡丹半坼初經雨，雕檻翠幕朝陽。蝨子倚動風，羞謝了群芳。洗煙凝露向清曉，步瑤台、月底霓裳。輕笑淡拂宮黃。淺施飛燕新妝～,牡丹半坼初经雨，雕槛翠幕朝阳。蝨子倚动风，羞谢了群芳。洗烟凝露向清晓，步瑶台、月底霓裳。轻笑淡拂宫黄。浅施飞燕新妆～

Items.mt: The peonies are in the middle of the rain and the sun is shining on them. The place is leaning against the wind, shyly thanking the fragrance. Washing the smoke and condensing the dew to the clear dawn, stepping on the stage, at the end of the month in a rainbow dress. Light smile and lightly brush the palace yellow. The new makeup of the lightly applied flying swallow ~
